summary: A documentary about the inventor of the first electronic synthesiser instrument and his subsequent life after he was abducted by the KGB as well as a history of his instrument.
cast: Leon Theremin|Clara Rockmore|Robert Moog|Nicolas Slonimsky|Paul Shure|Henry Solomonoff|Suki Bader|Beryl Campbell|Lydia Kavina|Brian Wilson|Todd Rundgren|V.I. Lenin|Ingrid Bergman|Bobby Burgess|Samuel Hoffman|Jerry Lewis|Ray Milland|Patricia Neal|Gregory Peck|Michael Rennie|Barbara Rush|Joe Sawyer|Jefferson Searles|Alex Tkaczevski
title: Theremin: An Electronic Odyssey
